GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:articles_id.description: returns an object containing information relevant to the article which matches the article id

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:articles_id.description: updates a given article's vote count and responds with that updated article

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:articles_id/comments.description: returns an array contatining comments relevant to the article_id

POST /api/articles/:articles_id/comments.description: adds a new comment to the comment table in the database. Username must match a username from within the users table

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment using the given comment id
